message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Its value is undeniable, and I believe it will be a great asset to you. I'm willing to part with it for $900,000. This price reflects its high quality and the potential benefits it offers. Let's discuss further and see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for considering my offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. In light of your feedback, I am willing to lower the price to $850,000. I hope this revised offer better aligns with your budget and expectations.

Bob, I understand your position. While I'm eager to make this deal work, $850,000 doesn't quite cover the value I've placed on this product. How about we meet in the middle at $875,000? It's a fair price that recognizes the benefits you'll gain from owning this. I'm confident this is a win-win situation.

Thank you for your proposal, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $860,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product and my budget.
